name: Somnolence
description:
We misread the deadline and assumed it would end on monday noon. For this reason finding out the actual dealine was less than an hour away and getting anything uploaded was a bit of a scramble. We will be uploading a first postjam version on monday.

Somnolence was created within 9 days during the Hones Game Jam III in fall 2021 by Purple Sloth Studio & Friends. All assets were made during the jam.

Fall asleep after a long days work only to find yourself in a strange, yet eerily familiar world.
